other_tests.findings: Dark, septate, branching hyphae and dark spherical elements, resembling chlamydospores observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initially identified fungal pathogen was later confirmed as Exophiala spinifera. Changes in findings over time are not specified.

other_tests.procedure_name: Needle aspirate from cervical lymph node
other_tests.findings: Dark, septate, branching hyphae and globular chlamydospores.
Dark septate hyphae and globular chlamydospores.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Fungal pathogen was eventually identified as Exophiala spinifera.

other_tests.findings: Scarce spherical septate mycotic elements, with brownish pigment in the dermis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 6 months of posaconazole therapy, cultures of skin biopsy specimens were negative for fungi.
